About.title: Hey there!
About.p1: I'm a software engineer passionate about designing and building scalable, high-performance systems. My focus is on backend development, software architecture, and microservices, with a growing interest in cloud infrastructure, which I’m actively exploring right now.
About.p2: I enjoy tackling complex challenges, improving system reliability, and continuously refining my craft. My approach to development is centered on scalability, maintainability, and delivering impactful solutions.
About.p3: This website is my space to share what I learn, document my journey, and contribute to the tech community. I believe in 'learning in public'—writing about experiences, challenges, and insights not only helps me solidify knowledge but also creates opportunities for meaningful discussions and collaboration.
About.p4: Beyond coding, I’m always learning—whether it’s diving into new architectural patterns, optimizing performance, or experimenting with personal projects. When I step away from the keyboard, you’ll likely find me working out, playing video games, or spending time with my dogs.

Experience.subtitle: Here you can find some of my professional experience.

currentRole.title: Software Engineer
currentRole.description: I focus on designing and implementing scalable backend solutions, improving system observability, and optimizing performance. I work with microservices architecture, real-time messaging, and distributed systems to enhance product reliability and user experience.

previousRole.title: Software Engineer
previousRole.description: I contributed to building internal tools, including an ERP system and a real-time collaboration platform. I worked on microservices, developed a CLI tool to streamline processes, and played a key role in system maintenance, testing, and performance improvements.

firstRole.title: Software Engineer
firstRole.description: I developed and maintained features for various client projects, including a platform for international scientific events with live video calls. I also contributed to documentation and internal knowledge-sharing initiatives while working with cloud services and modern web technologies.
